programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Ponderosa becomes a site of refuge for a woman suspected of being a witch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Able Lincoln's claim that he's the Great Emancipator himself amuses everyone except Matt Yorty.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Stubborn Grandpa Fogarty is Lucas's main roadblock as he tries to get young Woody Fogarty to attend school.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Trail-hardened Cassie Tanner joins the train, setting her eye on Major Adams. When the train desperately needs horses, she may be the only one able to make the dangerous journey to buy them.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Officer Reed loses a robbery suspect while in foot pursuit. Afterward, he and Malloy try to help a priest prevent bloodshed between rival hispanic gangs, and then respond to a battered wife whose husband is very familiar to the officers.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed drive up on a convenience store robbery in progress, which results in the suspects taking hostages. Later, they pull over a reckless driver who has just committed a heinous crime, learn about a new computer system designed to help them be more productive and finally thwart a group of serial burglars who use motorcycles.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Father Mulcahy counsels a GI who is plagued by guilt because he has swapped tags with a dead colleague. Meanwhile, B.J. and Charles consider ways of keeping a soldier-salesman quiet.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The latest scuttlebutt affects everyone's behavior when a visiting Army rep is rumored to be recruiting for a new M*A*S*H unit. The gang fears that the 4077th will be split up.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye writes a heartfelt letter to President Harry Truman to protest at the continued fighting in Korea. Meanwhile, Colonel Ditka has promised a much-needed water heater if the 4077th beautifies the camp.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: On the eve of a big poker game, B.J.'s pride is bruised when he finds out his wife is working as a waitress. And Potter takes driving lessons from Klinger.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie is afraid that Andy's new girlfriend, Peggy, will take his place in his father's heart, and sets out to sabotage their relationship.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney and Floyd run out of gas while coming home from a fishing trip. While looking for a telephone they are captured by three female escaped convicts.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny believes she has the power to predict the future, and she is set on doing whatever she needs to make her predictions come true.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver spends a lot of time in the principal's office when Lisa enrolls at Hooterville High. In school primarily for a cooking course, she also disrupts history class with her own version of Hungary's past, destroys the womens' showers and explodes a chemistry lab.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan visits a local Hofbrau to get the plans to a German army division that is camping out nearby.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Oil For The Lamps Of Hogan
programme.desc: Hogan convinces Klink that there is oil underneath the camp in order to discourage the Germans from building a synthetic fuel plant there.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Perry Como And Tim Conway
programme.desc: "Guests Perry Como and Tim Conway. Originally aired on 01/20/69."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Hasty Honeymooner
programme.desc: Lucas Tolliver arrives in California from Oklahoma to meet the woman he was matched up with by a computer dating service. The woman, Miliicent Barton, is supposedly a rich widow.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a business man plans to build a dam in Africa, a witch doctor puts a curse on him.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A marriage about to be broken is saved by a killer."

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A war hero must choose between a new love and the girl he left behind.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix is fired from Intertect while his boss suffers from a medically induced psychosis, causing Joe to use desperate measures to crack the case and save Wickersham's life.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: A young dancer who teaches at a lonely hearts club winds up dead. One of his clients hires Cannot to find out who killed him. It isn't long before Frank discovers the dancer was also a con man who had bilked several women out of their life savings. And that lengthens the list of suspects considerably.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby is used to smuggle narcotics.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: One of Kate's old flames pays a visit, but his efforts to rekindle their romance are thwarted by his dominating sister.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe becomes the new postmaster of Hooterville and moves the post office to the Shady Rest.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Drysdale tells an IRS man the story of the Clampetts and how they got to be where they are today. But Granny and Jed don’t trust this man because they think he is a revenuer, and refuse to let him on the property.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Even though the Clampetts are enjoying Maria’s cooking, Granny is upset that there is another cook in her kitchen. She wants Maria to leave, and Jed knows Maria leaving is the best thing to make everything right. However, Jethro is in love with Maria, hoping to marry her. Jane figures out a way to get Maria in good with Granny. She arranges a meeting between the two cooks, and Jane tells Maria to answer "Yes" to everything.

programme.title: Popeye and Pals
programme.sub-title: House Tricks?, Vim, Vigor And Vitaliky, Mess Production
programme.desc: "Popeye and Bluto fight each other to prove they can build Olive Oyl's house., Popeye, the proprietor of a gymnasium for women, has Olive Oyl as one of his pupils., Popeye and Bluto, two rival factory workers, fight each other for privilege of saving Olive Oyl."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: Much Ado About Mousing, Chump Champ, Jerry's Diary
programme.desc: "Tom has problems with a dog as he chases Jerry., Droopy and Spike compete at a Sports Carnival to be crowned the King of Sports., Tom gets tired of chasing Jerry so he takes a seat and finds Jerry's Diary which he checks out."

programme.title: The Woody Woodpecker Show
programme.sub-title: Dopey Dick The Pink Whale, Kiddie Koncert, Swiss Mis-fit, Arts And Flowers, Scrambled Eggs, A Horses Tale, The Reluctant Recruit
programme.desc: "A gruff captain forces Woody to join a hunt for a pink whale., Wally conducts a whimsical animal band., A rescue dog tries to prove himself by saving Chilly, but only ends up in trouble himself., Woody competes with a snobby artist in an art contest., A mischievous satyr switches the eggs of several different nests to confuse the expectant forest animals., Sugarfoot finds a new job as a stunt double after a misunderstanding gets him kicked off the farm., Woody unknowingly joins the Foreign Legion, thinking he's signing up for a free vacation."

programme.title: A Bugs Bunny BOOnanza Bash
programme.sub-title: Broom-stick Bunny, Water, Water Every Hare, Falling Hare, Transylvania 6-5000, Hyde And Hare, Hair-raising Hare
programme.desc: "Bugs makes a visit to Witch Hazel who is infatuated with her own ugliness and needs a rabbit for her stew... , A flood floats a sleeping Bugs and his mattress off his bed and out of his rabbithole, downriver to the castle of an evil scientist. , A gremlin hijacks a WWII bomber and Bugs must stop him before the gremlin does some serious damage. , While tunneling to Pittsburgh, Bugs Bunny mistakenly surfaces in Transylvania and meets a vampire named Count Bloodcount. , Bugs gets himself adopted as a pet by a kindly soul who has been feeding him carrots every day. Bugs' friend turns out to be Dr. Jekyll who drinks his evil potion and turns into a monster. , A mad scientist sends a beautful rabbit-robot to lure Bugs in as food for his monster. "

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night Of The Man-eating House
programme.desc: Jim, Artie, and a sheriff are accompanying a prisoner through the swamps when they take refuge in an abandoned house... haunted by the spirit of a dead woman.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "A little girl, crying each night, appears to be a ghost from The Donner Party. Many people hear her, but she appears each night to Charlie, who questions his own sanity."

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: Two men are found hung, and a note left by each of them claims a third person will die: Victoria Barkley.

programme.title: Marshal Dillon
programme.desc: "Matt’s old flame Dolly Winters comes and asks Matt to help her find her husband Rad Meadows. Kitty’s suspicious of Dolly. Matt finds Rad but he’s not like Dolly said he was. Matt tells Dolly to leave town but instead she rides to Rad’s house."

programme.title: Marshal Dillon
programme.desc: "Corporal Janice takes off with the Army payroll after an ambush. Matt has to find his accomplice who no one got a look at. Matt gets a line on Janice and finds him. His father gets the drop on Matt and shoots Chester and holds them hostage at his house."

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Joe is about to shoot what he thinks is a wolf but discovers it is a woman. She turns out to be a gypsy banished by her people because they believe she is possessed by the devil.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Rowdy's old acquaintance, Louise Temple, is on the run for killing a sheriff. She ran the Temple Of Gold gambling hall.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.desc: When Paladin finds a woman and her apparently typhoid-afflicted child abandoned by a wagonmaster, he enlists the aid of a female doctor from a nearby town, but a religious fanatic then tries to bar them from entry.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: In Mexico, Josh protects a sensible man and his pregnant wife. The villagers are angered because the man threw the town "witch" off his property.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a young man, eerily similar to a man he killed in the Civil War, challenges him to a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: At Halloween, rustlers take advantage of the seasonal disguises to raid a cattle ranch.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Spook Louder, Idle Roomers, Ghost Talks, Dopey Dicks, Spooks, Who Done It
programme.desc: "The Stooges are left in charge of a spooky mansion, when an eccentric inventor goes to Washington with a death ray. , The Stooges are working as bellboys in a large hotel when a side show promoter shows up with 'Lupe', a wild wolfman who promptly escapes. The Stooges try to capture the wolfman by playing music to calm him, but music makes the wolfman go berserk and soon the Stooges are the ones trying to run away. The boys end up caught in an elevator with the wolfman who shoots them into the sky. , The Stooges are private detectives looking for a missing millionaire. They wander around the millionaire's spooky mansion confronting various crooks and a dangerous dame. The Stooges vanquish the crooks (Shemp uses his "trusty shovel") and find the missing man. , The Stooges are movers for an express company and on a rainy night are sent to move some junk, including a suit of armor, from a spooky old house. The armor is haunted by the ghost of Peeping Tom, who has no intention of leaving. The ghost foils the Stooges attempts to take the armor, until Lady Godiva shows up and the two ride off together. , It's mindless fun at its best when the Stooges meet a mad scientist in search of a human brain for his headless mechanical man. , The stooges are private detectives hired to find a missing girl, which leads to a mad scientist. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "One-of-a-kind alien invasion sci-fi featuring blood drinking alien clowns harvesting a small city."

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "A series of decapitations on a Swiss mountainside appear to be connected to a mysterious radioactive cloud."

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Sventoonie learns from the master himself, Svengoolie, about how to be a horror host. The fanatical fish then swims through George Romero’s classic film “Night of the Living Dead” and shows some minor mistakes that viewers may have missed in classic horror movies."

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "The gang watches the Beatnik horror classic 'A Bucket of Blood', while Svengoolie's nosy neighbor stops by to help Trevor — who happens to have two buckets stuck on his hands."

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Jack Nicholson's early film 'The Terror' brings a wild bird named "Gary" to the dungeon, not to mention a not-so-famous actor."

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Cult classic 'Carnival of Souls' draws an organ player to the dungeon."

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "When watching 1973's 'Werewolf of Washington,' Trevor decides to run for office against Batty Bradley. Woof!"

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.sub-title: Ain't No Party Like A Donner Party
programme.desc: "Kerwyn is getting a rival TV show of his own?! With his own DJ? Sventoonie finds the idea even scarier than 1973's 'Messiah of Evil'."

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Blob E. Blob has a weird, new human body and it's getting a celebrity roast. Plus, the gang watches cult vampire flick 'The Body Beneath.'"

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Watching 'Eegah' leads to makeovers for everyone, as Sventoonie hosts… a talk show?! Also, who is this new "Svengoonie"?"

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Sventoonie and Trevor babysit problem child Hell Lynn, who causes a real out-of-body experience for everyone as they watch 'Grave of the Vampire.' "

programme.title: Sventoonie
programme.desc: "Trevor's mean ol' Tombstone Video boss returns with a new outlook on life, as the gang watches Seventies slasher flick 'Drive-In Massacre'."

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: "A tree-logging machine is out of control in South America and it's about as easy to stop it as it is to win a guerrilla war. Can International Rescue stop the thing before it reaches a dam construction site?"

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: After discovering she is failing in science class, Kelly is tutored by Screech, and soon develops a crush on him.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack uses his subliminal advertising course to get Kelly to go with him to the Sweetheart Dance. But when his plan backfires, the whole school vies for his affection.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: The gang starts a business selling friendship bracelets, but Zack's tough work schedule tests the limits of their friendship.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: When Zack and Slater's prank war against rival school Valley High escalates, Screech gets kidnapped!

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: When Fred and Barney release a little green alien from his crashed space ship, the creature pledges to serve them.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred falls asleep and dreams that he has slept for 20 years.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Trouble follows when Fred goes into the pie business.

programme.title: The Jetsons
programme.desc: George accidentally goes through the Minavac, which shrinks him down to six inches high. The only way he can return to regular size, is by stealing a cog from Cogswell Cogs

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Peter's new detective kit comes in handy when Cindy loses a pair of antique earrings that Marcia has borrowed from Carol. This leads Peter and Cindy on a search for the missing earrings, hoping to find them before an impending costume party, at which Carol plans to wear them.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: The boys trick Jan and Cindy into thinking they've seen a ghost. The girls plot their revenge, but it's Alice, Carol and Mike who mistakenly end up as their victims.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver and Larry become convinced that the Cooper house is haunted by a witch and Beaver and Larry are scared to death. So when June gets Beaver a job walking Mrs. Cooper's dog, Beaver's fear gets the best of him.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver has Gilbert over to spend the night but after they watch a gangster movie things get out of hand. A suspicious car has just pulled up to the front of the house with two strange characters sitting inside, and they just happen to be Lumpy and Bill, dressed for a masquerade party. Not knowing this, Beaver calls the police and Lumpy and Bill are arrested.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts are feeling homesick. They are mostly all alone in Beverly Hills. And none of their neighbors are visiting them. So they decide to go visit their new neighbors. Little do they know, it is Halloween, a holiday they have never heard of. They visit many different houses, and in the end they get bagfuls of candy and treats.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Rock 'n' roll idol Johnny Poke visits the Clampetts while in town to play the Hollywood Bowl. Granny's not too happy about it; she's worried Jethro will pick up his bad habits. Granny loses her temper and thinks she turned Jethro into a puppy when she says he needs to be taught a lesson.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: A ghost appears on the island and tries to scare the castaways off, but they turn the tables by dressing in sheets to scare the visitor away.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan is bitten by a bat.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama discovers her husband's been buried in the wrong spot and that she's been visiting another man's grave. Anxious over the mistake, she refuses to visit again until she receives a sign that he forgives her.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Fran dies, Mama is set on giving her sister the perfect sendoff.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A magician keeps his engagement secret in order to dazzle female audiences, while his neglected fiancee turns to Captain Stubing for comfort; Doc and Gopher pursue a model who is afraid to face people after a recent accident; a boy with a habit of lying can't get anyone to help during a real time of need.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: After Opie and his friend, Arnold, hit a baseball into the window of an old, abandoned house, they hear noises and run for help. Barney and Gomer go to investigate—and hear noises, too!

programme.title: Collector's Call
programme.desc: "As movie costume collector James Azrael puts it, “movies define us.” To him, movies serve as markers in time, tracking milestones in one’s life. But collecting costumes and props is about more than just the personal connection for James; it’s also a way of preserving history. He considers himself the keeper of these iconic costumes for a moment in time, and he and his friend Brad have restored many of the items to their original condition. James’ collection boasts identifiable costumes from films like Robocop, Little Shop of Horrors, The Terminator, Friday the 13th and countless more. James and Brad are joined today by friend, appraiser and fellow movie costume collector Mark, who often helps James track down highly sought-after items. Mark has brought along an item in hopes of making a trade … but James has never traded or sold one of his costumes or props."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Winchester infuriates the camp when he hoards his stateside newspapers, and Hawkeye reunites two Korean brothers who have been fighting on opposite sides of the war.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.sub-title: Follies Of The Living - Concerns Of The Dead
programme.desc: While suffering a fever, Klinger communicates with the spirit of a dead soldier, Private Weston, who stays on to witness his own last rites.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: As a practical joke, Archie fixes up one of his drinking buddies with female impersonator Beverly La Salle.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: The Bunkers take in a boarder to help revive their battered budget.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Mike and Gloria are having a discussion over who will take care of Joey, just in case there comes a time when both of them are unable to care for the little tyke before his 18th birthday. Mike has serious reservations over allowing in-laws Archie and Edith to get custody of Joey, particularly due to what he perceives as Archie's bad influences. Gloria is having a hard time convincing Mike.

programme.title: All in the Family

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show

programme.desc: Rob tries to find a home for an unattractive dog.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Ralph tries to learn how to play golf to impress his boss, and, of course, the situation turns into a disaster.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A janitor living in the year 1890 accidentally activates a time traveling helmet, which transports him to 1962—and then promptly breaks down.

programme.desc: A disturbed chemist refuses to accept his ex-girlfriend's marriage to a co-worker.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Prime Minister Larya of Svardia is working to establish democracy, but is unaware that his personal protege, Deputy Premier Pavel, plans to set up a dictatorship. The team must persuade Larya of Pavel's plans.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Actor Frankie Burns is murdered on a movie set. Gunn finds out that the crime was committed to cover up another crime.

programme.title: Peter Gunn

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: An innocent man is pursued by the Highway Patrol and felons when he unknowing helps a robber escape.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A police officer is shot while making a routine check on a pair of paroled convicts parked near a liquor store.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon use newspapers, radio and TV to publicize their clues to the identity of a hit-and-run driver.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Mike and Sally get married and move East. When Uncle Charley jokes that Steve may soon be a grandpa, he worries he's growing old.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony prove the critics wrong as they look back at negative reviews of some of pop culture's most iconic music, movies, and more!"

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver decides to join the basketball team but finds himself trying to live up to Wally's performance. However, after not making the team, Beaver allows his family to believe that he did.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Seeing an ad for typewriters on sale, Beaver talks his parents into letting him get one as long as he learns how to use it. However, Beaver discovers learning to type is not as easy as it looks and soon finds himself making a deal with the shady Eddie Haskell.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Garrulous Gambler
programme.desc: Larry Benton is a hard-luck guy. He gets in an argument in a poker game and knocks Mike Granger out cold. Then he is informed him that Granger is dead.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: A private investigator's daughter shoots some photos that get the wrong man accused of murder.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Virgil's Aunt Ruda is the only witness to a struggle between Bubba and a young robbery suspect that ends in the young man’s death. But her prejudice against the police -- and Virgil clouds her memory of the incident. Bubba returns to Los Angeles to testify at a murder trial and is reunited with Pat Day as they try to protect Mike from killers sent to prevent him from testifying.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia gets a job in the city as a dressmaker

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Men at the Long Branch believe one of the "saloon girls" brings them luck at Blackjack. Matt's suspicious and tries to run her and the dealer out of Dodge when men start killing each other over her."

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Matt rescues a white woman (who was let go by the Cheyene) and a child from buffalo hunters then has to protect her from her Boston husband."

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When the Cartwrights catch young Billy Penn trying to steal some of their cattle they try to set the young rustler on the straight and narrow.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark meet Mark Twain and find out that he hides a sad secret.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to stop embittered John Holliver from venting his wrath on the people who expelled him from town years before.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Tensions are running high in the train between Northerners and Southerners traveling west. As trouble escalates one passenger with a noticeable limp, John Wilbot, is accused of being John Wilkes Booth, who many believe to still be alive.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Officer Tony Johnson finds out he has been accused of a shakedown just after saving Malloy's life during a shootout. Reed and Malloy set out to find a bar girl named Ginger who Johnson says will prove his innocence, but her story leaves Malloy with an uneasy feeling.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Reed and Malloy have a gun pulled on them after stopping a car that turns out to be stolen, but the contents of the trunk link the two suspects to an even more sinister crime. Afterward, a recently widowed father and his teenage daughter report that their home has just been toilet papered, which ends up being a prelude for a much more serious incident.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The military police think they've solved a rash of thefts at the 4077th when they apprehend Klinger with Hawkeye's stolen camera.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: B.J. and Hawkeye resolve to clear Klinger's name after he chooses Winchester to defend him at his military court-martial.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Margaret's birthday plans are spoiled when she and Klinger get stranded on a desolate roadside. Meanwhile, Charles gives a lecture for Margaret, and the surgeons assist in the delivery of a calf.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye is outraged when a sensationalistic war correspondent, Clayton Kibbee, reports irresponsible G.I. stunts as tales of military valor.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bea longs for a special present: a blue bed jacket.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney tries to convince everyone of a lack of security at Mayberry Bank, and is furious that no one listens to him. Taking matters into his own hands, he ends up stuck in the bank vault.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale buys the Clampetts a dress store using their money, and the clan decides to check it out. When they arrive at The House of Renee, they are mistaken for poor and Renee tries to help them. She thinks they need jobs. However, the Clampetts think Renee and her models are poor and starving. Renee gives the Clampetts money for food, and they think it is for them to buy food for Renee.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.sub-title: Lisa's Mudder Comes For A Visit
programme.desc: Lisa's mother surprises her and "Whatshisname" (Oliver) with a three week visit. She just became a countess--the title came with an estate she bought--but Eb tells everyone she's the Queen of Sicily. In her royal honor, the locals hold a Ceremonial Day complete with a solid gold wooden key to the city. The highlight is a 21-gun-salute using just one cannon and three balls.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: When Hogan tries to arrange the unscheduled escape of 20 men, his mission is complicated when a captured sergeant jumps the gun.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan and his men are tasked with getting an escaped prisoner and smuggled German gun sight to England. To accomplish this Hogan convinces Klink that he is fatigued and should have an officer's club in which to relax.

programme.desc: "Guests Shirley Jones and Ken Berry. Originally aired on 02/17/69."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Burt Payne coaches and owns 10% of a professional football team. His rich wife, Ellen, owns the remainder. Knowing that he's washed up and needing some quick cash, Burt tries to sell his share of the team to a group of investors.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A soldier gets a new perspective on war when he is forced to experience it from his enemy's point of view.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.sub-title: The Right Kind Of A House
programme.desc: A woman schemes to avenge her son's death with a unique plan.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A beautiful woman meets and falls in love with a stranger at her engagement party.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix is hired when a sniper begins killing citizens, the prime suspect being an escaped mental patient.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Kathy Ackers hires Cannon to find out why her father, a banker, committed suicide at a Caribbean resort. She thinks he was murdered, and wants Cannon to prove it. But the man was embezzling from his own bank, so maybe he did have a motive to kill himself...

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby matches wits with a debonair killer.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews and his officers assist a county sheriff in closing down a club that offers illicit gambling.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday goes undercover with the department's chaplain in order to bust a gambling ring.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday learns about a scam artist with a novel twist: he uses an authentic Congressional Medal of Honor to solicit magazine subscriptions.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Steve explores the possibility of adopting 10-year-old Ernie but runs into antagonism from Uncle Charley, who can foresee nothing but more work.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "After getting bonked on the head with a light fixture, Toony becomes a R&B singing sensation. With classic cartoons featuring singing, including Tom & Jerry's "Solid Serenade" and Porky Pig's "Swooner Crooner". "

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward comes down hard on Wally after he comes home two hours late, this fuels June and Ward's suspicions that Wally is contemplating joining the Merchant Marines. June had discovered some pamphlets hidden in his dresser drawer. However, little does anyone know, Wally has been getting the information for Lumpy who's seriously thinking of joining.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver gets a new girl in his class and is instantly smitten. He begins walking her home from school but he soon realizes that the girl has an agenda on her mind. Her sole purpose is to get close to Beaver in order to get close to Wally. This leads Beaver to accuse Wally of stealing his girl.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Blushing Pearls
programme.desc: Mitsuo Kamuri has been seeing a great deal of Grover Nichols, son of wealthy businessman Hudson Nichols. Nichols doesn't approve of his son's relationship and when Mitsuo is "caught" with a string of valuable pearls belonging to Mrs. Nichols, he agrees to absolve her if she stops seeing his son.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: With Matlock out of town, Michelle takes a murder case in which she suspects an old lawyer friend may be the culprit.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Bubba travels to L.A. to testify in an organized-crime trial and to safeguard the key witness---a young boy (Mike Chin) who saw a mobster commit a murder.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen resists joining in on a quilting when she reaches the marrying age

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Matt goes after Ord Spencer for murder. He gets thrown by his horse and hits his head then gets kidnapped by the Cheyene."

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Lee Prentice is shot by Jake Harbin who has a dead or alive bogus murder warrant for him. Matt has to try and figure a way to keep him and Sherriff Ben Goddard from taking Lee back."

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A family embarks upon a kidnapping spree in an attempt to halt an execution.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas becomes the target of a vengeful mountaineer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark finds himself the unwilling companion of gunman Carl Avery.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Low on water, Flint scouts for more. When three water holes are dry or poisoned, Fort Paiute seems their only hope but he has to make it back to the wagon train on foot and the only other man who knows the way is believed to be a deserter.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Officer Reed, who is an optimist and still has faith in the human race, is subjected to ridicule from Officer Wells after he is swindled twice. On patrol, he and Malloy come to the aid of a woman whose baby has been kidnapped by a heavily armed man seeking a large ransom. Afterward, wells once again questions Reed's judgment during the search for an intoxicated sniper at large.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: The search for a stabbing suspect leads to a bitter ex-cop who has just moved into the area. Afterward, Malloy and Reed deal with a naive and frustrated starlet who shoots up a telephone booth and loses her suitcase containing a live rattle snake. The officers then become involved in shootout at a train station that leads to another unfortunate run-in with the ex-cop.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: An AWOL soldier, Nick Gillis, seeks sanctuary in the mess tent, after Father Mulcahy's service. At the same time, a special Sunday brunch is due to be served, following the donation of some eggs to the camp by a grateful farmer.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.sub-title: The Tooth Shall Set You Free
programme.desc: Charles has a serious toothache, but hates the thought of having anything done about it. The doctors suspect prejudice when an inordinate number of black casualties are brought in from a single unit, led by Major Weems.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Potter sends for Sidney Freedman when he loses confidence in his surgical abilities, and Winchester loses patience with his bunkmates' sloppiness.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.sub-title: Where There's A Will, There's A War
programme.desc: Hawkeye goes to help at an aid station, and under heavy shelling he draws up a will, leaving various items to his friends at the 4077th.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie must learn to defend himself against a bully.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney is goaded into ticketing the governor's car and mistakenly believes Andy is setting him up for a dressing-down by the governor.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is waking up the family so they can get to their new store: The House of Granny. Jethro wakes up sleepy, not wanting to be up, but as soon as Granny mentions breakfast, he is dressed in a split second. Jed is carving a Y in the kitchen, and when Jethro sees the shavings in the bowl, he thinks it is cereal. Jed tells him to have corn flakes instead. Granny goes to wake up Elly May, saying that her store opens at a decent hour—the crack of dawn!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver misunderstands when the Hooterville bigwigs ask him to be a judge. He thinks he's being appointed an appellate judge but they just want him to judge apples at the county fair. The Douglases travel to New York so Oliver can get some judging advice while Lisa shops for a robe and wig for His Honor.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: The guys plan to destroy a gun emplacement so the Allies can attack on Hitler's birthday.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: French gold has been stolen by the Nazis. Hogan convinces Klink to have it brought to Stalag 13 so the prisoners can steal it back.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Barbara Mcnair And Soupy Sales
programme.desc: "Guests Barbara McNair and Soupy Sales. Originally aired on 02/24/69."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Wrathful Wraith
programme.desc: Louise Self finds herself in the unfortunate position of having to stand trial for the murder of her husband twice.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A reporter goes from star to villain and then back to "star.""

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A handsome homicide detective is befriended by four old ladies who invite him for tea and proceed to play out a variation of Arsenic and Old Lace for his benefit."

programme.title: Mannix
programme.sub-title: You Can Get Killed Out There
programme.desc: Mannix's attempt to locate a stolen necklace leads him to a case of murder and fraud.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Private eyes so rarely get a vacation free of peril, and Cannon is no exception. He goes fishing, little knowing that someone from his police past is hunting him: a murderer determined on revenge for the time he spent in prison.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: The managers of a rock music star, whom they think drowned in his pool, cash in on his "tragedy""."

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Matthews discovers insurance fraud and a murder made to look accidental.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A Japanese widow is senselessly murdered, leaving her small daughter an orphan. Friday has a hard time controlling his emotions while seeking the killer.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A gang of juvenile thieves have been stealing petty items in order to gain membership into an exclusive club.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Ernie's adoption into the all-male Douglas household is threatened by a regulation dictating that there must be a lady of the house.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill receives a special invitation to attend the homecoming dance at his old high school."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward doesn't take any excuses when he puts his foot down and demands that Wally and Beaver clean the yard. They each reluctantly cancel their plans with Richard and Eddie and get to work but soon find themselves with distractions. This causes them to miss the deadline to call the hauler who is suppose to take all the yard waste away and this leads them to pay Eddie and Lumpy to take care of it.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: "Wally finds himself smack dab in the middle of a lover's quarrel when a woman tries to make her estranged boyfriend jealous by continually making tennis dates with Wally. Wally finds himself in an awkward position when the boyfriend threatens him."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Startled Stallion
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher John Brant forecloses on Jo Ann Blanchard's mortgage and takes possession of her prized stallion. Jo Ann goes to Mason for help in getting the horse back but soon needs his aid in getting her off a murder charge.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When talk show host Dan Galloway is murdered after publicly humiliating three woman on the air and firing his executive producer, Matlock has no shortage of suspects as he looks for clues in the death of the despised man.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: A man murders his business partner and frames the man's illegitimate daughter for the crime in an attempt to gain the man's business and his wife.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An old abandoned home is condemned

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Bella Grant is brought to Dodge by Brisco Cass (Ken Curtis) to get Jerry Cass away from his ranch so his brother, Brisco, can claim the ranch as his own."

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "When a Buffalo hunter dies from injuries from burning lead, Matt and Doc think that their boss (Jim Gatluf) might have had something to do with the man's dying."

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A young man loves animals so much that he frees them from traps set by hunters—including his own father's.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for escape after he's captured by outlaws while seeking help for an injured Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The Queen-to-be of France hides out in North Fork.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: At the end of a long journey, lives were lost. Some made it with their dreams intact. Flint tries to help one of the passengers and almost bites off too much. Politics are involved as well as unsolicited trips to the Far East.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed participate in the search for two black militants who ambush and critically wound two officers in their patrol car. When one of the suspects subsequently dies in custody, a bitter public relations battle begins with the militant group as the search for the other suspect continues.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: A young employee at the city garage steals a patrol car and engages in a high speed pursuit. Afterward, Malloy and Reed arrest a young woman trying to cash an old-age benefits check she found on the ground, report to an apartment complex garage that had its security camera stolen, investigate a break-in at a mortuary and arrest a couple of pill pushers at a warehouse in Officer Ed Well's territory.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Winchester, Pierce and Hunnicutt find themselves in the sticky position of having to decide which enlisted men to recommend for promotion. For Winchester it could be a matter of life and death.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye is the golden boy of the world press when he treats a celebrity prizefighter, "Gentleman" Joe Cavanaugh, who has a stroke at the 4077th. Father Mulcahy finds the news hard to take, as Cavanaugh was a hero of his.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: After losing to the Marines once again, Colonel Potter wishes there was one sport the 4077th were any good at. When Klinger mentions he can bowl, the Colonel decides to have a bowling competition. Unfortunately, he and Klinger are the only two good bowlers in the camp, so BJ and Father Mulcahy are "recruited" to the team.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Potter's attempts to assemble the crew for a family portrait are thwarted by a feud between bunkmates Pierce, Hunnicutt and Winchester. Things are not helped by the efforts of Margaret, Klinger and Mulcahy to bring the Swampmen back together.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Big businessman Malcolm Tucker is stuck in Mayberry on a Sunday when his car breaks down outside the city limits. He's soon driven to frustration when he finds there is no way to get anything done until the following day.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney gets hysterical when Andy receives a letter from a man he arrested and sent to prison. The convict is to be released soon and says in the letter that he is coming to settle the score with Andy.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Having been given a stylish makeover by a famous French couturier, Elly May is mistaken for a visiting foreign princess by Mrs. Drysdale. Hoping to get in good with "royalty," Mrs. Drysdale throws a fancy party for Elly. This time around, the old dear is certain that her soiree won't be invaded by "those dreadful hillbillies."

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The descendant of Herman, a pig that predicted the weather with his tail, stands to inherit the $20,000,000 Birnbacher estate. Fred Ziffel is convinced it's Arnold, who has the same talent. Fred, along with everyone else in Hooterville, pressures Oliver to take Arnold to Chicago and claim his inheritance. Oliver, however, isn't interested in becoming a pig lawyer.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan tries to detain a German general at camp for 24 hours to allow the Allies to amass troops. Things get complicated when a Gestapo officer comes in search of the reason for Klink's perfect record.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: A group of underground operatives that Hogan and his team begin working with is actually a group lead by a Gestapo captain who's set on capturing them.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Martha Raye And Mike Douglas
programme.desc: "Guests Martha Raye and Mike Douglas. Originally aired on 03/17/69."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Runaway Racer
programme.desc: Test driver Pete Griston cracks up a vehicle owned by Pappy Ryan. Pappy accuses Havey Rettig of tampering with the car and files charges against Rettig and Griston. Then Rettig is killed and Griston is found standing groggily over the body.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An eccentric millionaire invites three people to visit him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "Walter Richmond is a gullible tennis player with a nose for snooping. He meets a woman named Laura Gild and tries to learn everything about her. His curiosity does not pay off when she and her supposedly dead husband scam him for money."

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A seedy character comes up with an amazing formula and then puts it to good use.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Bernie Farmer is mistaken as being responsible for a missing million dollars used as bait in a drug ring.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "Cannon takes on a missing person's case which leads to the death of a policeman."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: As a thief awaits trial, his accomplice puts out a contract on the only witness to the crime.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Matthews investigates when a small town wants him to leave.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A dead man has been found in a locked room, along with a gun that could not have been the murder weapon.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A surly teenager throws acid on the back of another student and later crashes a party armed with a live hand grenade.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Uncle Charley is upset when he learns that Robbie is dating a flashy chorus girl, but Steve refuses to worry because he trusts his son's common sense.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony take a look back at the Kung Fu craze of the 1970s with a surprise visit from a martial arts master."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Eddie and Wally finally get a chance to join the most exclusive social club in school, the Barons. However, after hanging out with the Barons on a Friday night, Eddie and Wally realize they don't want to be in this club because the guys really aren't who everybody thinks they are.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver, Richard, Whitey and Alan each buy sweatshirts that have monster faces on the front of them. They like them so much they each decide to wear them to school the next day. However, each one finds that their parents forbid them from wearing such hideous sweatshirts to school. However, Beaver manages to sneak out of the house with his on.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Reckless Rockhound
programme.desc: When a businessman responsible for decimating a local mining business returns to town, it is not long before he is found murdered.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock tries to prove that someone other than his client had a motive in a murder case. His best bet? The victim's paraplegic husband.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: The lyrics to a blues song recall a murder that happened 50 years earlier. The victim - Sweet's grandfather. And the only people left with the answers are the bluesman who wrote the song and a retired sheriff.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy wants to buy a printing press to start his own newspaper

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Andy Hill comes to Dodge looking for a job. Matt finds out he's wanted for robbery but decides to take a chance on him."

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: "Gunman Kin Creed comes to Dodge and tries everything to get Matt into a gunfight."

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After his father becomes seriously ill, a young boy decides to climb a mountain and seek God's help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Micah has an infamous outlaw, Charlie Gordo, in his jail waiting for the U.S. marshal from Denver to take Gordo to the Yuma prison for hanging. With the arrival of the stage, Micah finds that the lawman has been killed, and he has to look to his friends to defend the jail from Gordo's gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas' old Army pal settles in North Fork with his deaf daughter.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Planning to sail to Boston, the Major, Hawks and Charlie are instead shanghaied to New Orleans where they meet a Captain who has different ideas on raising his child and running a ship.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are called to a tavern robbery in progress, and then are jolted by a severe domestic abuse situation they are powerless to stop. In the meantime, they lose track of a naive college girl who has just been carjacked by a convicted rapist.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Because Malloy has allowed his driver's license to expire, Reed has to do the driving on today's busy patrol. They search for an ice cream truck driver who's been trying to sell marijuana to children, get an unexpected reaction from a bank robber, help a man who's had his house completely emptied by his neighbors, deal with a woman who shoots her husband dead and find a live baby in a trashcan.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger buys a goat, with the intention of getting rich by selling its milk. Then the goat eats the 4077th's $22,340 payroll, leaving paymaster Hawkeye holding the bag. Meanwhile, Charles also thinks he can make a killing when he sees an ancient vase.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Margaret and her nursing staff are about to be inspected by Col. Bucholz. Meanwhile, Kellye is offended that Hawkeye is attracted to nurses besides her.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The Army tries to get a North Korean pilot to defect, and Charles gets a rude shock when he falls for a French nurse with a Bohemian past.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Tired of reminders about Trapper John's skill as a practical joker, B.J. bets Hawkeye he can prank everyone present.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: An escaped goat eats a case of dynamite that was going to be used for blasting and puts Mayberry in danger—especially when Otis Campbell gets drunk.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy meets up with his high school sweetheart at their reunion and it appears they could be rekindling their relationship. But do they want the same things, and did they ever?

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts, Drysdale and Jane are heading to their castle in England. Their plane ride isn’t the easiest, especially for Drysdale and another passenger. Jethro smuggles Elly’s turkey, buzzard, on board, and Drysdale is attacked by it in the bathroom, as well as another man who has the misfortune of being seated near the clan.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: "Noted pig lawyer" Oliver, Lisa and Eb arrive in Chicago to prove Arnold's the rightful heir to a $20,000,000 fortune. While Arnold is given the royal treatment by the hotel staff, the Douglases are treated as persona non grata. The red carpet is rolled up for them all once Arnold's tail predicts snow--in July!

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan gets Schultz to portray Klink in order to free three of his men whom the Gestapo has captured.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: To get a Italian officer to defect, Hogan and the gang use pizza to tempt him.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Larry Hovis And Barrie Chase
programme.desc: "Guests Larry Hovis and Barrie Chase. Originally aired on 03/24/69."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Silent Six
programme.desc: Police Sergeant Dave Wolfe warns Joe Oliver to stay away from his kid sister, Susan. Now Susan's been beaten up in her apartment, Oliver has been shot to death and Dave is being charged with murder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A bookkeeper decides to come out of anonymity by committing a crime."

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: When a woman finds a bomb in her car, it convinces her that her husband loves her.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.sub-title: Eight To Five, Its A Miracle
programme.desc: Mannix is hired to investigate an alleged miracle that has been occurring on the land of a crime boss.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: A former prostitute aids Cannon in an investigation involving mobsters.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: It's one killing after another as Barnaby investigates a hit-and-run accident while wealthy townspeople plot his murder.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews and his officers race against time to find a stolen oil indicator device that contains potentially lethal radioactive pellets.
